CodeBlockMethod.Name: DecreaseSpeedFactor
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local kb = self.Entity.KinematicbodyComponent local oldSpeedFactor = kb.SpeedFactor local newSpeedFactor = Vector2(oldSpeedFactor.x - 3, oldSpeedFactor.y - 3)
kb.SpeedFactor = newSpeedFactor

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleRectTileEnterEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local Kinematicbody = event.Kinematicbody local TileInfo = event.TileInfo local TileMap = event.TileMap local TilePosition = event.TilePosition -------------------------------------------------------- if TileInfo.Name == "Box02" and Kinematicbody:IsOnGround() then --self.Entity.CustomPlayerComponent.Drag = 5 --self.Entity.CustomPlayerComponent.AirDrag = 4 --self:DecreaseSpeedFactor() self.Entity.CustomPlayerComponent.Enable = true log("Unfixed") end
